statements: SELECT * FROM iot_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM iot_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location, last_update FROM iot_devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM iot_devices WHERE last_update > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location FROM iot_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM iot_devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM iot_devices ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM iot_devices WHERE ST_Distance(location, ST_GeogFromText('POINT(0 0)')) < 1000;
SELECT device_name, location FROM iot_devices WHERE last_update > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT COUNT(device_id) AS device_count, year(last_update) AS update_year FROM iot_devices GROUP BY year(last_update);
SELECT * FROM DeviceLocations;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM DeviceLocations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT device_id, device_name, longitude FROM DeviceLocations ORDER BY longitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM DeviceLocations WHERE device_name LIKE '%a%';
SELECT device_id, device_name, latitude, longitude FROM DeviceLocations WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT device_name, latitude, longitude FROM DeviceLocations WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, latitude, longitude FROM DeviceLocations WHERE device_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT device_name, latitude, longitude FROM DeviceLocations ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, latitude, longitude FROM DeviceLocations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -70;
SELECT device_name, movement_time, movement_type FROM DeviceLocations JOIN DeviceMovements ON DeviceLocations.device_id = DeviceMovements.device_id WHERE movement_type = 'Walking';
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT name, location FROM devices;
SELECT device_id, name, location, last_updated FROM devices;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE name = 'Device1';
SELECT device_id, name, last_updated FROM devices ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, location FROM devices WHERE last_updated > '2021-01-01'
SELECT device_id, name FROM devices WHERE location IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE location = 'POINT(10 20)' AND last_updated BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT name, location, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM last_updated) AS month FROM devices
SELECT device_id, device_name, latitude, longitude, recorded_at FROM device_locations;
SELECT device_id, is_active, battery_level FROM device_status WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT geofence_id, geofence_name, latitude_center, longitude_center, radius FROM device_geofences ORDER BY geofence_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_history WHERE event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND event_timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT device_id, device_name, latitude, longitude, recorded_at FROM device_locations WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM device_locations ORDER BY device_name DESC, recorded_at ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, device_name, latitude, longitude FROM device_locations WHERE latitude > 50 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT device_id, device_name, MAX(latitude) AS max_latitude, MIN(latitude) AS min_latitude FROM device_locations GROUP BY device_id, device_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT dh.history_id, dh.event_description, dh.event_timestamp, ds.is_active FROM device_history dh LEFT JOIN device_status ds ON dh.device_id = ds.device_id WHERE dh.event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND ds.is_active = TRUE ORDER BY dh.event_timestamp DESC;

SELECT dg.geofence_name, dl.device_name, sqrt(POWER(dl.latitude - dg.latitude_center, 2) + POWER(dl.longitude - dg.longitude_center, 2)) AS distance FROM device_locations dl, device_geofences dg WHERE distance <= dg.radius;
SELECT * FROM Device;
SELECT device_name, location FROM Device WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT device_id, data_value FROM DeviceData ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, status FROM DeviceStatus WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT DISTINCT device_id, location FROM DeviceLocationHistory;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM Device WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT data_id, device_id, data_value FROM DeviceData WHERE data_value > 100;
SELECT connection_id, device_id, connected_device_id FROM DeviceConnection ORDER BY connection_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, status, status_timestamp FROM DeviceStatus WHERE device_id = 2 ORDER BY status_timestamp ASC;
SELECT history_id, device_id, location FROM DeviceLocationHistory WHERE ST_DISTANCE(location, ST_POINT(-122.345, 47.621)) < 1000;
